name: Open Catalog Extension Connection File
summary: Learn about .OCE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OCE files may be created by selecting Tools→Connection→Create... within the database software. They are saved in the "Open Catalog Extensions" folder by default.
NOTE: OCE files are also supported by Brio Intelligence, which was acquired by Hyperion in 2004. Oracle acquired Hyperion in 2007.

description: Database connection file used by the Hyperion Intelligence database management system (DBMS); defines the connection software, type of database, username, password, host, data retrieval method, and optional database name.
